dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4675 IH: Columbia River Clean-Up Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Hoyle of Oregon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to reauthorize the Columbia River Basin Restoration program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Columbia River Clean-Up Act.
Section 123(d)(6) of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (33 U.S.C. 1275(d)(6)) is amended by striking 2020 and 2021 and inserting 2026 through 2030.
